extendedInfo.description: Quickly determine Who owes Who (WOW?) after your round of Golf!Love playing golf with your buddies?  Enjoy playingSkins?, Nassau?, Wolf? Sandies? Greenies? and all thoseother fun games which makes your round more enjoyable?Then, when it's all done, you have to figure out Who owes Whobased on the number of points everyone earned during the round.With WOW? by Cluffers.com, simple enter the number of Pointseach player won, how much each point it worth, and with a clickof a button, you will see Who owes Who.  Another click and you quickly see who the big winner is, ormore important, Who's Buying?.Scenario #1 - Simple Skins Game$1 Skins game with 4 Players(IF each player put in $18 each hole would be worth $4)Player A had 8 skinsPlayer B had 7 skinsPlayer C had 3 skinsPlayer D had 0 skinsThe WOW App quickly determines Who owes Who.  The Winners simply get paid by the Losers....Results:Player A WON $14	8 X $4 = $32 - $18 (imaginary buyin)Player B WON $10	7 X $4 = $28 - $18 (imaginary buyin)Player C LOST $6	3 X $4 = $12 - $18 (imaginary buyin)Player D LOST $18	0 X $4 = $0 - $18 (imaginary buyin)PayoutsPlayer D owes Player A $14Player D owes Player B $4Player C owes Player B $6It's as easy as that!  This will work for any number of players and you can easily change the value of each skin.Scenario #2 - Let's have some betting fun!Games played during the round:$1 Skins$2 Birdies$1 Sandies (Bunker and 1 putt)$3 Double Sandy (Bunker to Bunker and 1 putt)$4 Barkies (Hit a tree and still get par)$1 Snakes (3-Putt - paid to all other players)$5 Lowest Front Nine$5 Lowest Back Nine$5 Lowest Final scoreDots should placed next to the players name on the scorecard after eachhole is played.  Once the round has been completed, simply count all thedots for each player and enter the total into WOW.In this example, each Dot is worth $1Player A earned:  4 Dots for 2 Birdies  3 Dots for 3 Skins  3 Dots for Double Sandy    5 Dot for winning Front 9  1 Dot for Player B Snake  1 Dot for Player D Snake  Player A Total: 17 DotsPlayer B earned  2 Dots for 2 Skins  4 Dots for a Barky  1 Dot for a Sandy  1 Dot for Player A Snake    with 1 Snake  Player B Total: 8 DotsPlayer C  8 Dots for 10 Skins  5 Dots for the lowest Back Nine  5 Dots for the lowest Final score  6 Dots for 3 birdies   1 Dots for Player A Snake  1 Dot for Player D Snake  Player C Total: 26 DotsPlayer D  4 Dots for 2 birdies  5 Dots for the lowest Front Nine  2 Dots for 2 Sandies  3 Dots for 3 skins  with 1 Snake  Player D Total: 14 DotsThe WOW App quickly determines Who owes Who.  The Winners simply get paid by the Losers....PayoutsPlayer B owes Player C $33Player D owes Player C $6Player D owes Player A $3It's as easy as that! No confusion!, No arguments!

reviews.title: WOW
reviews.comment: Very nice app.  Would be nicer if you can save the total points/skins and not loose all the data once the application is close.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: I want a refund.
reviews.comment: Don\'t install. Waste of money. Misleading.
reviews.author: Eric Dufur

reviews.title: Not working
reviews.comment: Paid. System keep asking the licence key. Crashed. Unable to refund. Not recommended
reviews.author: david liman

reviews.title: Works great
reviews.comment: Great purchase. This program saves so much time while trying to figure out \"who owes who\" at the end of a round. We had an eightsome and played skins, front, back and eighteen, sandies and greenies. WOW calculated wins and losses instantaneously. Highly recommend this inexpensive app.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Seriously a waste of money. Glorified calculator.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Awesome app. It makes payout time quicker and so much easier.
reviews.author: A Google User
